entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as having red eyes and a burning scar on Harry's forehead.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story. He has a burning scar on his forehead, which indicates that he is connected to Voldemort.

entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is a character in the story who seems to be loyal to Voldemort. He is mentioned as being present when Voldemort and Harry are interacting.

relationships.description: Voldemort has a connection to Harry through the burning scar on his forehead. This is mentioned in the text as 'Harry's burning scar'.
Voldemort seems to have a loyal relationship with Severus, who is present when Voldemort and Harry are interacting.
